reasoning: Synovial sarcoma is a rare soft tissue malignancy, representing ~5-10% of soft tissue sarcomas. Estimated incidence ~0.8 per 100k per year based on SEER data and epidemiological studies.
source: Parham DM et al. (2001). Synovial sarcoma: prognostic factors and detection of the t(X;18) translocation by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction. Cancer. 91(4):697-703
